resources.string: This application lets your friends to send a \"silent\" SMS to you. They would just start a message with \"#s\" to make your phone to receive _this_ SMS in a silent mode or with \"#v\" to use vibration only.
\"#v Dude, are you sleeping? Call me\" \n\"#s Good night, dear :-*\"
To stop handling tags in SMS press \"Halt handling\" button
Now tags handling is off. To resume press \"Resume handling\" button
Your phone receive SMS-es with #v in vibration mode
